data:
Submodule is built around a function first-class support. It utilizes nature of functions to
Share configuration, services
Caching
Composition

As such, submodule can be used to reuse configuration, functionality, group of services, group of codes. As they are all functions, they encourage testability and reusability

Simpliest, yet very flexibile Inversion of Control within 100 lines of codeWhat Submodule brings?
✅ Typescript out of the box
✅ Browser, Node.js, Deno, Bun, you name it
✅ Easy to understand
✅ No magic, no codegen
✅ Integratable with all frameworks, bring your Next.js, Remix, Solid, Fastify, Express

Submodule 4.0 comes with a much lighter set of API to over-simplify operation
